verses.1: Topa in Zion ah eite hong ciah pihkik ciangin i mang tawh kibang liang hi.
verses.2: Lungdamin i nui a, lungdam lua-in la i sa hi. Tua ciangin minam dangte kiho-in, “ Topa in amau adingin na lianpite bawl khinta hi,” kici uh hi.
verses.3: Topa in eite adingin na lianpite bawl khinta a, eite i kipak hi.
verses.4: Topa aw, lei keuna munah guah in tui a puak bangin koteʼ nopsaknate a ngei hong bangsakkik ta in.
verses.5: Khitui tawh khai a tuhte lungdamin kikona tawh an la sak ta in.
verses.6: Kap kawmin kuan khia-in a tuh ding khaici a pua mi lungdamin kikona tawh buhlomte pua-in hong ciah ding hi.
